Store of value is not the primary use case for most cryptoassets. Using the underlying consensus mechanism to transfer a native unit in exchange for the network’s good/service is primary purpose (MoE), which then drives the “cryptoeconomy” upon which SoV is built

You can have a crypto w/ a high PQ, and low NVT ratio - would be what I expect of mature cryptocurrencies over time, actually (if this model proves out, of course )

PQ = size of transactional economy for a crypto, which plays role in solving for M. You’re right that the same PQ is what’s used to divide net val to create NVT. No conflict tho, as NVT ratio is just a form of calibration (ie, relative valuation), PQ is a network fundamental
